weapon_description: This gilded bow was made using precious white branches. It has felled countless wicked beasts attempting to infiltrate the woods.
weapon_skill_name: At the End of the Beast-Paths
weapon_skill_description: Gain 24% All Elemental DMG Bonus. Obtain the Tireless Hunt effect after hitting an opponent with a Charged Attack. This effect increases Charged Attack DMG by 320% of Elemental Mastery. This effect will be removed after 12 Charged Attacks or 10s. Only 1 instance of Tireless Hunt can be gained every 12s.
